Package com.rapidminer.belt.column

Interface CacheMappedColumn

  • public interface CacheMappedColumn
    Interface for an extra map method for mapped columns that supports caching. This interface is not part of the Belt API and might be removed without prior notice.
    Author:
    Gisa Meier

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Column map​(int[] mapping, boolean preferView, java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<int[],​java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<int[]>> cache)
      Specialized implementation of Column.map(int[], boolean) that checks the given cache for previously computed merges of the current and the given mapping.
      default int[] waitForOrCompute​(int[] key, int[] mapping, java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<int[],​java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<int[]>> cache)
      Merges the key with the mapping or waits until someone else has computed the result.

    • Method Detail

      • map

        Column map​(int[] mapping,
           boolean preferView,
           java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<int[],​java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<int[]>> cache)
        Specialized implementation of Column.map(int[], boolean) that checks the given cache for previously computed merges of the current and the given mapping.
        Parameters:
        mapping - the index mapping
        preferView - whether a view is preferred over a deep copy
        cache - map from old mapping to merged mapping when merged with the given mapping
        Returns:
        a mapped column

      • waitForOrCompute

        default int[] waitForOrCompute​(int[] key,
                               int[] mapping,
                               java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap<int[],​java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<int[]>> cache)
        Merges the key with the mapping or waits until someone else has computed the result.
        Parameters:
        key - the current mapping
        mapping - the mapping to merge
        cache - the cache containing merged mappings or ongoing computations
        Returns:
        the merged mapping
